statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerChurnRates;
SELECT customer_name, churn_date FROM CustomerChurnRates WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerChurnRates WHERE churn_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, churn_date, churn_reason FROM CustomerChurnRates ORDER BY churn_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, churn_reason FROM CustomerChurnRates WHERE churn_reason LIKE '%poor service%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerChurnRates WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY churn_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, churn_date FROM CustomerChurnRates WHERE churn_reason IS NOT NULL AND churn_reason <> '' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, churn_reason FROM CustomerChurnRates WHERE churn_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(churn_date) AS churn_count FROM CustomerChurnRates GROUP BY customer_id HAVING churn_count > 1 ORDER BY churn_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name, churn_reason FROM CustomerChurnRates WHERE churn_reason LIKE '%technical%' OR churn_reason LIKE '%price%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, churn_reason FROM customers JOIN churn_rates ON customers.customer_id = churn_rates.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM churn_rates WHERE churn_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY loyalty_points ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers JOIN churn_rates ON customers.customer_id = churn_rates.customer_id WHERE churn_reason = 'Unsatisfied' ORDER BY churn_date DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_id, customers.customer_name, churn_reason FROM customers LEFT JOIN churn_rates ON customers.customer_id = churn_rates.customer_id WHERE churn_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT CONCAT(customer_name, ' - ', loyalty_points) AS customer_info FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(customer_name) > 5 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS purchase_count FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, cr.reason FROM customers c JOIN churn_rates cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = 3;
SELECT name, churn_date FROM customers c JOIN churn_rates cr ON c.customer_id = cr.customer_id WHERE cr.reason = 'unhappy' ORDER BY churn_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE signup_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name, phone FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'email' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, churn_reason FROM churn_rates WHERE churn_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE signup_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE phone IS NOT NULL
SELECT c.name, c.email, i.interaction_date, i.interaction_type FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id
SELECT r.strategy_name, r.strategy_description FROM retention_strategies r
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM Customer WHERE churned = FALSE;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT action_date, action_description FROM RetentionAction ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer WHERE join_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(churn_probability) AS avg_churn_prob FROM ChurnPrediction;
SELECT customer_name, action_date, action_description FROM Customer INNER JOIN RetentionAction ON Customer.customer_id = RetentionAction.customer_id;
SELECT Customer.customer_name, LoyaltyTier.tier_name FROM Customer JOIN LoyaltyTier ON Customer.loyalty_points >= LoyaltyTier.point_threshold;
